content:
Has that now been dropped form the current publisher?
In trying to rebuild the VhDir guide its now really quite broken.
(also, is there some guidance somewhere for switching over from it - long overdue for me and also over to the new hl7 template now that it's really stable)
no it's still officially supported but I don't think it's used very much at all. And it's only really officially supported because I haven't removed it

However I do note that this parameter isn't supported in the old format, so I guess need to update things.
The IG resource does not contain a copyrightYear parameter.
I think it does, it is not documented.

I've managed to clean up many of the newly reported issues in the VhDir IG (due to newer IG publisher rules - since pre-covid) and something in this one has me a little stumped, looks like the markdown guidance pages aren't generated anymore.
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/qa.html
(this is a pre-HL7 template IG)
@Eric Haas any tips on this one? Results in 13796 broken links (as everything points to toc, index ...)

HL7 AU au-fhir-base is still using the legacy json approach and is now failing to build with IG publisher v1.1.102 - I suspect due to incompatibilities with the new publisher rendering.

Created zulip thread https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179173-australia/topic/HL7.20AU.20IG.20fails.20to.20build.20with.20IG.20publisher.20v1.2E1.2E102
Confirming HL7 AU IG now builds with IG Publisher v1.1.103
